sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <input v-model.trim="title" type="text">
    <button @click.prevent="onSubmit" type="submit">Create</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    todos: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      title: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit() {
      const trimmedTitle = this.title.trim();

      if (trimmedTitle === '') {
        return;
      }

      // Check if the title already exists in the todos array
      const titleExists = this.todos.some(todo => todo.title === trimmedTitle);

      if (titleExists) {
        console.warn("Title already exists!");
        return;
      }

      // Proceed with form submission logic
      console.log(trimmedTitle);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

input {
  width: 400px;
  height: 40px;
  margin-right: 1rem;
}
</style>
